description: Promotes a data replication replica broker to the primary broker role.

parameters.name: BrokerId
parameters.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the broker.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: The Promote mode requested. Note: Valid values for the parameter are SWITCHOVER, FAILOVER.

nested_items.name: BrokerId
nested_items.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the broker.
